custchurn.Title: Customer Churn Analysis
custchurn.Description: A simple EDA and predictive model on Telco Customer Churn Data.
custchurn.Categories: Data Science, Machine Learning, Predictive Binary Classification

glmnet.Title: GLM ElasticNet
glmnet.Description: A python implementation of GLM based Elastic Net with various distributions.

cancertreatment.Title: Cancer Treatment
cancertreatment.Description: A python notebook from a Kaggle competition surrounding Cancer Treatment studies.

custseg.Title: Customer Segmentation of Language App Data
custseg.Description: An in depth analysis of language app data and user information, segmented using PCA and KMeans.

way2b1work.Title: Gmail Analysis and Predictive Modeling
way2b1work.Description: Stemming from a take home assignment for an interview, I used the GMAIL API to understand more about my emails with NLP and a simple classification task.

rollcool.Title: Programmatic Solution to Steady State 3D Thermal Modeling
rollcool.Description: Stemming from a project from years ago, the ask was to solve the PDE for 3D steady state cooling of a steel cylinder when cooled from various angles. This work contains the proposed solution, math, and model.
